English: I am pleased to meet you.
The cat is sitting on the chair.
Spanish: El gato está sentado en la silla.

English: I am looking forward to our conversation.
The teacher explained the lesson very clearly.
Spanish: El profesor explicó la lección muy claramente.

English: This museum has many interesting exhibits.
Spanish: Este museo tiene muchas exposiciones interesantes.

English: I enjoy spending time with my friends.
Spanish: Disfruto pasar tiempo con mis amigos.
